metadata.name: Polyqui 3
metadata.description:
The 3rd NFT in a trilogy created in 2021 during the height of the Pandemic in Japan.
Polyqui refers to "poly = many" and "qui = ki" which is the Japanese word for spirit or one`s thinking.

The trilogy is a special exploration of the evolution of CHROMA and nature.
The first 2 NFTs were released on HEN.
